thread.title: Tripping.com Adds New Accommodation Partner, Dobovo
thread.title_full: Tripping.com Adds New Accommodation Partner, Dobovo

author: Tripping
title: Tripping.com Adds New Accommodation Partner, Dobovo
text: Receive press releases from Tripping: By Email RSS Feeds: Tripping.com Adds New Accommodation Partner, Dobovo Tripping.com expands global presence with the addition of 8,500 Ukraine listings from Dobovo and the release of its Russian-translated site. San Francisco, CA, September 25, 2015 --( PR.com )-- Tripping.com, the world's largest vacation rental search engine, announced today the addition of its newest partner, vacation rental platform Dobovo. Dobovo will join top rental sites already partnered with Tripping.com, including HomeAway, VRBO, Roomorama, Booking.com and more.Dobovo offers accommodation options ranging from the budget-friendly to the truly luxurious for travelers visiting Ukraine. The company is committed to helping travelers find their ideal property through a user-friendly website and great customer service. Every listing is verified through phone and email and Dobovo encourages guests to use the 14,000 customer reviews to help make an educated decision when booking. Dobovo's inventory in Ukraine expands Tripping.com's global user base and brings travelers even more options when searching for a holiday home.In conjunction with the launch of the Dobovo partnership, Tripping.com also today launched its Russian-translated site. The local language site provides the company an opportunity to reach Russia’s substantial and growing market, which boasts the 6th largest online market in the world with an estimated 94 Million users.“As many travelers already know, Ukraine is a beautiful part of the world. We’re pleased to announce our new partnership with Dobovo, as they offer truly unique properties across Ukraine,” said Tripping.com CEO Jen O’Neal. “We believe our users will appreciate having direct access to Dobovo’s rental properties and we’re excited to extend Tripping.com’s reach into Eastern Europe.”Volodymyr Bezliudnyi, one of the Dobovo founders, concurs. “With Tripping.com, Dobovo can tap into a new range of prospective guests both in Ukraine and beyond our borders. This is a strategic move and we’re happy that our rental properties will be seen and booked across the world.”Dobovo has made their entire inventory available on Tripping.com. With millions of travelers visiting Tripping.com every month, the partnership will enable Dobovo to attract new users and gain greater brand recognition throughout the world.About Tripping.comTripping.com is the world's largest site for vacation homes and short-term rentals. With over 5 million properties spanning 100,000+ destinations, Tripping.com makes it easy to compare vacation rentals from the world's top travel sites including HomeAway, VRBO, HouseTrip, Booking.com and more. To find an amazing vacation rental today, visit www.tripping.com.About DobovoDobovo is a Ukraine-based company that hosts more than 8,500 properties across Ukraine. With a wide range of options, responsive customer service, and customer reviews, Dobovo provides excellent service and quality to users for a reasonable price. Contact Information
